1.title: Parachute Drop

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: "Betty White's Off Their Rockers" is a hidden-camera comedy series that takes senior stereotypes and blows them out of the water with a cast of sassy septuagenarians who are hip, sexy and ready to party! America's favorite comedy sweetheart sends a fearless band of senior citizens to the streets to pull shockingly hilarious pranks on the younger generation in this outrageously funny "hidden camera" show unlike anything viewers have ever seen.

2.title: Writing Tickets for Makeup Violations

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: America's favorite comedy sweetheart sends a fearless band of senior citizens to the streets to pull shockingly hilarious pranks on the younger generation in this outrageously funny "hidden camera" show. Sassy seniors target unsuspecting young "marks" with their irreverent behavior, from pouring a late spouse's ashes on a favorite park bench or writing up tickets for absurd, made-up violations, to asking strangers to watch a runaway motorized scooter or pretending to see a dead person who appears all too real.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: This week, one senior asks for help texting a very intimate message, while another tries to get signatures for a petition allowing only beautiful people to reproduce. Other pranks include a hung over stewardess complaining about passengers at an airport gate waiting area, a senior who needs a lot of help calling a relative in Europe, and a hospital patient with a very unique IV solution served by "The Love Boat" bartender Ted Lange.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: This week, a sassy senior takes matters into his own hands when he doesn't like the music played by a street performer, a patient in an ambulance tries to make a daring escape, and a woman at the grocery boldly takes things from the shopping carts of others. Other pranks include a gassy man who isn't welcomed on a shopping mall bench, and a tired senior who falls asleep at the wheel while riding his electric scooter.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Betty White's sassy senior pranksters are back on the streets, pulling outrageous pranks on the younger generation.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: This week, two nuns try an innovative approach to raising money for breast awareness, a man decides to make his own alterations on a shirt he likes in a store, and an old man escapes blame for insulting a security guard.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: This week, Wink Martindale gets some surprising news while pretending to tape a game show segment, a woman asks for help after getting her dog stuck in an unusual place, and two pranksters set up a metal detector on the street, much to the dismay of two young men who keep setting it off.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Betty White's merry posse of senior pranksters is back on the streets, while Betty entertains viewers with funny sketches and comical pearls of wisdom between the pranks. This week, Adam West ("Batman") gets in on the fun searching for a masked man in a cape, while an elderly man and his wife try and find a young couple who want to "swing." Also, a wife enlists a stranger to pretend they are romantically involved to annoy her husband, and a prankster tells restaurant customers that his heart came from a surprising donor.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Betty White's posse of senior pranksters is back on the streets, while Betty entertains viewers with funny sketches and comical pearls of wisdom between the pranks. This week, Wink Martindale gets some surprising news while pretending to tape a game show segment, a woman asks for help after getting her dog stuck in an unusual place, and two pranksters set up a metal detector on the street, much to the dismay of two young men who keep setting it off.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: This week, a lost skydiver asks for directions, an older woman orders a younger man online and a prankster repeatedly hugs a stranger he insists is a long lost friend. Plus, two nuns delight in tricking men passing by, and a blind man gets out of a convertible and asks for directions.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: This week, an old woman asks a young man to buy beer for her because she fears getting carded without her ID, a snack vendor insists on sampling the drinks before she sells them, and two men sitting on bleachers try to enlist another in doing "the wave." Also, a woman propositions a younger man hoping to cross the last thing off her bucket list, and a senior is caught stealing another's walker when the alarm goes off.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: Actor and comedian Rob Schneider gets in on the fun this week, guest starring as Betty's shrink, while her pranksters are busy trying to recruit a male friend for a "bromance", offering "free creepy backrubs" to pedestrians walking by and trying a little too hard to prevent littering. Also this week, a man gives citations to mall shoppers for absurd violations, and two old ladies try to interest a young man in a "senior sandwich".

1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Seven-time Emmy award winner Betty White and her posse of senior pranksters are back for season two of this hidden camera series, continuing their mission to pull shockingly hilarious pranks on the younger generation. Kim Kardashian joins the fun as this week's guest star, learning in one bit that she is related to Betty - and what Betty expects being part of the Kardashian clan.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Seven-time Emmy award winner Betty White and her posse of senior pranksters are back for season two of this hidden camera series, continuing their mission to pull shockingly hilarious pranks on the younger generation. Kim Kardashian joins the fun as this week's guest star, learning in one bit that she is related to Betty - and what Betty expects being part of the Kardashian clan. In another segment with Betty, Kim gets make-up and wardrobe advice from America's favorite comedy sweetheart so the two can get ready for a girls' night out on the town. And Betty's fearless...

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Betty White's posse of senior pranksters is back on the streets, while Betty entertains viewers with comical pearls of wisdom between the pranks, as well as funny sketches.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: This week, Betty White gets advice on starting a successful boy band from Nick Lachey, who also discusses his "celebritot" baby, while her merry posse of senior pranksters is on the streets pulling pranks on the younger generation. A senior tries to enforce a "height requirement" at a basketball game arena to make sure ticket holders are tall enough to attend the game, a man tickles a stranger with a large feather, and a prankster asks for help reading her husband's R-rated grocery list.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: This week, guest star Bob Harper joins the fun with seven-time Emmy Award winner Betty White and her posse of senior pranksters. Sassy senior citizens pull shockingly hilarious pranks on the younger generation in this hidden camera show featuring cleverly-crafted comedic stunts, candid moments and priceless reactions captured by hidden camera. As star of the series, Betty White stars in funny sketches between the pranks and shares her comical pearls of wisdom.

6.title: Delicious Disappointment

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: This week, special guest Nicole Richie joins the fun with seven-time Emmy Award winner Betty White and her posse of senior pranksters. Sassy senior citizens pull shockingly hilarious pranks on the younger generation in this hidden camera show featuring cleverly-crafted comedic stunts, candid moments and priceless reactions captured by hidden camera. As star of the series, Betty White stars in funny sketches between the pranks and shares her comical pearls of wisdom.

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: This week, guest star NeNe Leakes ("The New Normal") joins the fun with seven-time Emmy Award winner Betty White and her posse of senior pranksters. While Betty's sassy senior citizens are out pulling outrageous pranks on the younger generation, NeNe schools Betty in the art of getting mad and throwing wine on people who irritate her. The series features cleverly-crafted comedic stunts, candid moments and priceless reactions captured by hidden camera, with Betty appearing in funny sketches between the pranks and sharing her comical pearls of wisdom.

8.title: Episode #2.8

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: This week, "Real Housewives of Beverly Hills" Adrienne Maloof, Camille Grammer and Kyle Richards join the fun with seven-time Emmy Award winner Betty White and her band of fearless pranksters. While Betty's sassy seniors are out pulling outrageous pranks on the younger generation, the "Housewives" learn to be careful what they wish for when they ask to join Betty for a photo shoot.

9.title: Episode #2.9

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: This week, Betty White prepares her house to accommodate special guest Howie Mandel and his germaphobia, and later, Howie schools Betty in the art of fist-tapping instead of hand-shaking, with unexpected consequences.

10.title: Episode #2.10

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: Nick Cannon joins the fun as this week's special guest, and discovers the darker side of Betty White when discussing his twins and the advantages of having a look-alike. Meanwhile, Betty's sassy senior tricksters are back on the streets pulling more funny pranks on the younger generation.

11.title: Betty - Giving Back

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Episode #2.12

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: Betty White's sassy senior tricksters are out on the streets pulling more funny pranks on the younger generation. This week, two partying seniors ask strangers where a rave is, a female prankster on a bachelorette party scavenger hunt asks hot guys to bite candies off her shirt, and enthusiastic senior citizens put up a finish line at a popular hiking spot and cheer people on as they break through the tape.

13.title: Episode #2.13

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: This week, Betty White's sassy senior tricksters are keeping busy directing traffic inside a grocery store, giving movie-goers bad reviews of the movies they are about to see, and cutting loose at an arcade on a follow-along dance machine. Also, one senior gives a young girl a ticket for an absurd violation involving a statue, while another blows bubbles on unsuspecting shoppers.

14.title: Episode #2.14

episode of.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers (TV Series 2012– )

14.plot: Seven-time Emmy Award winner Ed Asner is the special guest on the season two finale, first playing a lusty suitor of Betty White's who she meets through online dating and then later, appearing as the prize Betty brings home from a charity auction.

imdb.title: Betty White's Off Their Rockers
plot: A hidden camera show where senior citizens play pranks on unsuspecting youngsters.::Anonymous
